alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 3:41PM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the following county, San Bernardino. * WHEN...Until 645 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 341 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ludlow and Newberry Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
